keyword.name: fileparts
keyword.description: Returns the path, filename and extension of a file path.

keyword.name: filesep
keyword.description: Return the file separator character for the current platform.

keyword.name: fullfile
keyword.description: Build full file name from parts.

keyword.name: isdir
keyword.description: Returns true is the input argument is an directory.

keyword.name: isfile
keyword.description: Returns true is the input argument is a file.

keyword.name: isfolder
keyword.description: Returns true is the input argument is an directory.

keyword.name: pathsep
keyword.description: Return the search path separator character for the current platform.

keyword.name: relativepath
keyword.description: Returns the relative path from an actual path to the target path.
